Comments.Message: We'd love to help you, but sadly we can't, because you haven't provided the needed info. Please follow the bug reporting guidelines, so that we're able to help. Most important is obviously the character info.

Apologies,

I get the same error on each one.  This error was not present last night on 4.1.0, but today i am getting it from both 4.1.1, and 4.1.0.  So it MAY just be a network issue
I'm not seeing this error locally but trying with Nalara on the live server it throws an error
Looks like you may be able to get around the error if you use the Force Refresh option.
whatever the issue was it appears to be gone now, so i have no idea what it was.  Thank you for the attempt.
